item.title: Meeting education needs during COVID-19: partnering to reach the most vulnerable
First post by Irina
item.description: Irina’s First Blog Post I downloaded desktop.github.com I was able to clone the impact17 repos I added pictures and bios for all team members (still waiting for Steve) Using desktop is far easier

item.title: Style Guide
item.description: Note: The corporate green colour is 015b63 This file is .../content/english/style.md Since it’s at the top level, it can be accessed by appending /style in the URL bar. The idea is that this can be accessed by hand when needed; we won’t link to it.
